original: 《 天災 》　　　每過一段時間就有機會出現　　　「豐收、欠收、蝗災」等天災狀態；　　　唯在據點民怨高漲時，會發生「暴動」，　　　致據點運作停擺。
text: "Natural Disasters" 　　　 every time there is a chance to appear 　　　"buff, under-harvest, locust plague" and other natural disasters; 　　　 only when the base people's grievances are high, there will be "riots", 　　　 cause base operations to stop.
